text: Niccayamaka unmaiyana nampikkaiyalarkal meyyakave yarenral, allahvaiyum avanutaiya tutaraiyum nampikkai kontavarkaltan. Avarkal oru visayattaip parri alocanai ceyya ava(nutaiya tuta)ritam kutiyiruntal, avarutaiya anumatiyinri (kuttattiliruntu) avarkal vilakip pokave mattarkal. (Avvaru pokaventiya avaciyam erpattal, napiye!) Niccayamaka evarkal um'mitam anumatiyaikkori celkirarkalo avarkaltan allahvaiyum, avanutaiya tutaraiyum meyyaka nampikkai kontavarkal. Akave, avarkal tankal avacara velai onrukkaka um'mitam anumati korinal, avarkalil nir virumpiyavarkalukku anumati alippiraka. Avarkalukkaka allahvitattil mannippuk koruviraka. Niccayamaka allah mikka mannippavan, maka karunaiyutaiyavan avan
